overview: Jewel de Nyle is back, this time fucking the hell out of Joey... after handcuffing him to the refrigerator and making him beg for it. Venus is cover-girl beautiful and takes Mr. Marcus' huge dick at Buttman's house with no problem whatsoever. Jasmine and Nacho start having sex at a tradeshow in a backstage booth. They wind up in a hotel room where Jasmine has multiple anal orgasms. Jewel Valmont is very cute in her little chiffon dress, and fucks like she means it. 1st timer Chantal is a cute little thing who's a tad nervous at first, but by the time Jake Steed sticks it in, he's lucky to ever get it back!
title: Please!
